thread.title: Newspaper Describes Trump‚Äôs Inauguration as Episode of The Twilight Zone
thread.title_full: Newspaper Describes Trump‚Äôs Inauguration as Episode of The Twilight Zone

author: Justin Baragona
title: Newspaper Describes Trump‚Äôs Inauguration as Episode of The Twilight Zone
text:
Newspaper Describes Trump‚Äôs Inauguration as Episode of The Twilight Zone by Justin Baragona | 6:48   
In a scathing description in its latest edition, the Scottish newspaper Sunday Herald placed the upcoming inauguration President-elect Donald Trump in its television listings. Instead of treating it like the peaceful transfer of power between US presidents, the paper went in a slightly different direction. 
Yep, you read that right. The paper is describing Friday‚Äôs even as a return broadcast of The Twilight Zone , calling it ‚Äúone of the most ambitious, expensive and controversial productions in broadcast history.‚Äù 
In his characterization, Herald reviewer Damien Love also satirically noted that the ‚Äústory begins in a nightmarish version of 2017 in which huge sections of the US electorate have somehow been duped into voting to make Donald Trump president.‚Äù 
It ends by calling it a ‚Äúflawed piece‚Äù that gives a ‚Äúdisturbing glimpse of the horrors we could stumble into.‚Äù 
As one would expect, there was quite a bit of reaction online, with even the Herald publishing a piece on it. The Sunday Herald TV Section wins today. pic.twitter.com/OanCZdznGJ 
‚Äî George Takei (@GeorgeTakei) January 15, 2017 The TV Guide listing for Trump's inauguration in Scotland's Sunday Herald is amazing. #twilightzone üòÇ pic.twitter.com/fwUPMQ0Mw0 
‚Äî Elizabeth Tulloch (@BitsieTulloch) January 15, 2017 On a lighter note (sort of) Scotland's Sunday Herald synopsis of Friday's Inauguration is BRILLIANT. (H/T: @LynnGay11 ) #TwilightZone pic.twitter.com/zhO7ZOza3I 
‚Äî Dara Resnik (@BadassMomWriter) January 15, 2017 "A nightmarish version of 2017". Utterly brilliant preview from The Sunday Herald of The Twilight Zone v2 aka Trump's inauguration. https://t.co/M0elicoSUk 
‚Äî Joanne Allen (@joanneeallen) January 15, 2017 The Sunday Herald has a terrifying sense of humor https://t.co/d1xHmHS1ZC 
‚Äî Naheed Phiroze Patel (@naheedppatel) January 15, 2017
